original_text: Jeremiah wrote sad songs about Josiah's death. The male and female singers still sing these songs to remember Josiah, even today. The songs have become something that the people of Israel always like to sing. They are written in a book called ‘The book of sad songs’.
korean_text: 예레미야는 그를 위하여 애가를 지었으며 모든 노래하는 남자들과 여자들은 요시야를 슬피 노래하니 이스라엘에 규례가 되어 오늘까지 이르렀으며 그 가사는 애가 중에 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: The male and female singers still sing these songs
sentences.korean_translation: 남자와 여자 가수들은 여전히 이 노래들을 부릅니다

sentences.original_text: that the people of Israel always like to sing
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성들이 항상 부르기 좋아하는 것

sentences.original_text: They are written in a book
